tool_description: Analyzes app logs and system logs to identify errors, warnings, crashes, and performance issues during test execution.

log_source.description: Source of logs to analyze: app, system, crash, all

package_name.description: Package name to filter logs (required for app logs)

log_level.description: Minimum log level to analyze: verbose, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, all

time_range_start.description: Start time for log analysis in ISO 8601 format

time_range_end.description: End time for log analysis in ISO 8601 format

search_patterns.description: Specific patterns or keywords to search for in logs

error_messages: Invalid log source: Use one of [app, system, crash, all].
Invalid log level: Use one of [verbose, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, all].
Package name required: package_name is required when log_source is 'app'.
Invalid time range: Ensure time_range_start is before time_range_end and both use ISO 8601 format.
Log access failed: Could not access logs. Ensure proper permissions and device connectivity.
usage: Specify log_source to analyze. For app logs, provide package_name. Optionally filter by log_level, time range, and search_patterns. Returns categorized log analysis with error counts and critical issues.

total_log_entries.description: Total number of log entries analyzed

error_count.description: Number of error-level log entries found

warning_count.description: Number of warning-level log entries found

crash_detected.description: Whether any crash indicators were found in logs

critical_issues.description: List of critical issues identified in logs
